Messari Mainnet 2022 Recap: kicking off crypto Fall season in New York City
This year’s Messari Mainnet event was one of the main crypto events converging the crypto community in NYC this Fall. Bitstamp had a booth at the event

This year’s Messari Mainnet event was one of the main crypto events converging the crypto community in NYC this Fall. Bitstamp had a booth at the event where we:

  • Showcased a new product demo for institutions
  • Shared the results of our latest Crypto Pulse Survey from Q2
  • Caught up face to face with customers both old and new

In addition, we had a blast co-hosting a Tiki-themed happy hour on Thursday evening with Chainalysis, a long-time partner of ours, surrounded by more than 100 friends and partners.

We value having in-person opportunities to meet with our customers and partners whenever possible. We thank all of you who stopped by our booth, met with us or attended our happy hour.
